content: this heart bookmark crochet pattern is a quick and easy bookmark pattern that makes a wonderful gift for book lovers of all ages the pattern includes detailed instructions and a step-by-step video tutorial in less than 30 minutes you ll have a perfect gift for any reader or to use for your own reading enjoyment the gifting possibilities are endless you could make it as a gift for your grandchildren a mother s day gift a valentine s day gift a teacher gift a stocking stuffer at christmas a birthday present topper or as a just because gift for a friend each bookmark only requires approx 15 yds of yarn making them excellent scrap-busting projects since they take less than 30 minutes to make and even faster after making a couple you can crochet a lot of them in a short period of time these would be great items to sell at craft shows
